name: The Mars Function (Demo)
description:
Mars Function is a mystery story following a young woman as she races against time to prevent a global catastrophe on the planet Mars.

In Neo-Halifax of the not so distant future. Futuristic space ports and orbital elevators line the harbourfront and make up most of the downtown cityscape. Mars is a colony for Humanity, where they have moved most of the toxic factory work to reduce emissions and pollution on Earth. 

* This is  a pre-alpha version of the game. All assets are intended as placeholders. Final product may be significantly different than this preview.
